<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.GitHubCompanionUpdateManager</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>GitHubCompanionUpdateManager</name><script><![CDATA[var GitHubCompanionUpdateManager = Class.create();
GitHubCompanionUpdateManager.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	
	loadXML: function(xml, writeVersion, revertedFrom, sourceTable, sourceId) {
		var u = new GlideUpdateManager2(); 
		u.loadXML(xml, writeVersion, revertedFrom, sourceTable, sourceId);
	},
	
	saveRecord: function(gr) {
		var u = new GlideUpdateManager2(); 
		u.saveRecord(gr);
	},

    type: 'GitHubCompanionUpdateManager'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jnerius</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-10-17 23:41:40</sys_created_on><sys_id>f3b57136dbb5030005b1dec0cf961972</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GitHubCompanionUpdateManager</sys_name><sys_package display_value="GitHub Companion Global" source="a08e04ba13718b409718b9b76144b0a8">a08e04ba13718b409718b9b76144b0a8</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="GitHub Companion Global">a08e04ba13718b409718b9b76144b0a8</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_f3b57136dbb5030005b1dec0cf961972</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jnerius</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-10-18 00:41:08</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>GET</http_method><name>Head Version File</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {

    var fileUtil = new GitHubCompanionFileUtil();
	var version = fileUtil.getHeadVersion(request.pathParams.filename); 
	
	response.setContentType('text/xml'); 
	response.setStatus(200);
	response.getStreamWriter().writeString(version.payload);

})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/snc/v1/ghc_file_api/head_version/{filename}/file</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/head_version/{filename}/file</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>true</requires_snc_internal_role><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jnerius</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-10-17 16:45:47</sys_created_on><sys_id>77f55076db71030005b1dec0cf961909</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Head Version File</sys_name><sys_package display_value="GitHub Companion Global" source="a08e04ba13718b409718b9b76144b0a8">a08e04ba13718b409718b9b76144b0a8</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="GitHub Companion Global">a08e04ba13718b409718b9b76144b0a8</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_77f55076db71030005b1dec0cf961909</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-01-10 15:44:02</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="GHC File API">238e8c7613b18b409718b9b76144b086</web_service_definition><web_service_version display_value="v1">ad2fc0b2db71030005b1dec0cf96191b</web_service_version></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_82aecc7613b18b409718b9b76144b0d9
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.GitHubCompanionFileUtil</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>GitHubCompanionFileUtil</name><script><![CDATA[var GitHubCompanionFileUtil = Class.create();
GitHubCompanionFileUtil.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	
	getHeadVersion: function(filename) {
		var grHead = GlideappUpdateVersion.getHeadVersion(filename);
		gs.debug('Get Head Version for ' + filename); 
		gs.debug('Version SysID: ' + grHead.getUniqueValue()); 
		
		var obj = {}; 
		obj.type          = grHead.getValue('type');          // e.g. Script Include
		obj.record_name   = grHead.getValue('record_name');   // e.g. MyScriptInclude
		obj.payload       = grHead.getValue('payload');       // Full payload
		obj.name          = grHead.getValue('name');          // Filename
		obj.application   = grHead.getValue('application');   // Sys ID of App
		obj.action        = grHead.getValue('action');        // e.g. INSERT_OR_UPDATE
		obj.file_path     = grHead.getValue('file_path');     // ??
		obj.instance_id   = grHead.getValue('instance_id');   
		obj.instance_name = grHead.getValue('instance_name'); // e.g. dev15730
		obj.payload_hash  = grHead.getValue('payload_hash'); 
		obj.reverted_from = grHead.getValue('reverted_from');
		obj.source        = grHead.getValue('source');
		obj.source_table  = grHead.getValue('source_table');
		obj.state         = grHead.getValue('state'); 
		obj.sys_id        = grHead.getValue('sys_id');
		obj.update_guid   = grHead.getValue('update_guid'); 
		obj.update_guid_history = grHead.getValue('update_guid_history'); 
		
		return obj; 
	},

    type: 'GitHubCompanionFileUtil'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>josh.nerius</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-10-17 16:11:22</sys_created_on><sys_id>82aecc7613b18b409718b9b76144b0d9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GitHubCompanionFileUtil</sys_name><sys_package display_value="GitHub Companion Global" source="a08e04ba13718b409718b9b76144b0a8">a08e04ba13718b409718b9b76144b0a8</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="GitHub Companion Global">a08e04ba13718b409718b9b76144b0a8</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_82aecc7613b18b409718b9b76144b0d9</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jnerius</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-10-17 16:25:03</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_hub_step_instance"><sys_hub_step_instance action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><action display_value="GitHub Retrieve">ea14cd40db7db30053c6594e5e96193d</action><cid>61fe825d-d460-476b-ba54-b433091bde79</cid><extended_inputs/><extended_outputs/><icon/><inputs/><label>Pagination Setup step</label><order>3</order><outputs/><section>DATASTREAM_REQUEST</section><step_type display_value="Pagination Setup">737c7540e713230007a64caac2f6a9b6</step_type><sys_class_name>sys_hub_step_instance</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-05-28 19:56:36</sys_created_on><sys_id>72190108db7db30053c6594e5e961920</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Pagination Setup step</sys_name><sys_package display_value="GitHub Companion" source="x_snc_ghc">b9d683a9136db6009718b9b76144b01d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="GitHub Companion">b9d683a9136db6009718b9b76144b01d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_hub_step_instance_72190108db7db30053c6594e5e961920</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-05-28 21:11:43</sys_updated_on></sys_hub_step_instance><sys_variable_value action="delete_multiple" query="document_key=72190108db7db30053c6594e5e961920"/><sys_variable_value action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><document>sys_hub_step_instance</document><document_key>72190108db7db30053c6594e5e961920</document_key><order>200</order><sys_class_name>sys_variable_value</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-05-28 21:11:43</sys_created_on><sys_id>134ad188dbbdb30053c6594e5e96190f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-05-28 21:11:43</sys_updated_on><value>(function paginate(variables, pageResponse) {
    // Use this script to set pagination variables or 
    // manipulate variables extracted by XPath or JSON Path
    var limit = parseInt(variables.limit);
    var currentPage = parseInt(variables.page);
    var nextPage = currentPage++;
    if(nextPage < limit){
        variables.page = nextPage.toString();
    } else {
        variables.getNextPage = false;
    }

19:04:43</sys_updated_on><value>(function paginate(variables, pageResponse) {
    // Use this script to set pagination variables or 
    // manipulate variables extracted by XPath or JSON Path
    var limit = parseInt(variables.limit);
    var currentPage = parseInt(variables.page);
    var nextPage = currentPage++;
    if(nextPage < limit){
        variables.page = nextPage.toString();
    } else {
        variables.getNextPage = false;
    }
})(variables, pageResponse);</value><variable display_value="">f68d35c0e713230007a64caac2f6a959</variable></sys_variable_value></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_6b3dcdfadbf10300d0d6f7fdbf9619b0
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_snc_ghc.GitHubUtils</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>GitHubUtils</name><script><![CDATA[var GitHubUtils = Class.create();
GitHubUtils.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },

	parseDiff: function(filename, diff) {
/*		var regex = new RegExp("(diff --git a\/" + filename + ".*?)(diff|\z)", "m");
		var matches = regex.exec(diff);
		if (matches) {
			return matches[1];
		}
*/
		var lines = diff.toString().split("\n");
		var inMatch = false;
		var diffFile = "";
		for (var i = 0; i < lines.length; i++) {
			if (lines[i].startsWith("diff")) {
				if (inMatch) {
					break;
				} else if (lines[i].indexOf(filename) > -1) {
					inMatch = true;
					diffFile += lines[i] + "\n";
				}				
			} else {
				if (inMatch) {
					diffFile += lines[i] + "\n"; 
				}
			}
		}
		return diffFile;		
	},	
	
    type: 'GitHubUtils'
};

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ui_script_4a0d4f29676132009ff4dbd457415ae7
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ui_script"><sys_ui_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description/><global>false</global><name>x_snc_ghc.login_app</name><script><![CDATA[angular.module('ghLogin', [])
	.controller('GitHubLoginCtrl', function($scope, $http, $window) {   
	
	// Set default header X-UserToken
	$http.defaults.headers.common['X-UserToken'] = $window.g_ck; 
	
	$scope.twoFactorRequired = false; 
	$scope.username = ''; 
	$scope.password = ''; 
	$scope.code     = ''; 
	$scope.message  = ''; 
	$scope.error    = ''; 
	
	$scope.login = function() {
		console.log('$scope.username: '        + $scope.username);
		console.log('$scope.password.length: ' + $scope.password.length);
		console.log('$scope.code: '            + $scope.code);

		var data = {}; 
		data.username = $scope.username; 
		data.password = $scope.password; 

		if ($scope.twoFactorRequired && $scope.code) {
			data.code = $scope.code; 
		}

		$http.post('/api/x_snc_ghc/gh/gh_token', data).then(
			function success(response) {
				console.log(response); 
				
				var status    = response.data.result.httpStatus; 
				var twoFactor = response.data.result.twoFactor; 

				if (status == 401 && twoFactor) {
					$scope.twoFactorRequired = true; 
					$scope.message = "Please enter your two-factor authentication code."; 
				} else if (status == 201) {
					$window.close();
				} else {
					console.log('got the error...' + response.data.result.message); 
					$scope.error = response.data.result.message; 
				}
			}, 
			function failure(response) {
				console.log(response.data); 
			}
		); 
	};
});

]]></script><script_name>login_app</script_name><sys_class_name>sys_ui_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jnerius</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-03-17 02:23:41</sys_created_on><sys_id>4a0d4f29676132009ff4dbd457415ae7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>15</sys_mod_count><sys_name>x_snc_ghc.login_app</sys_name><sys_package display_value="GitHub Companion" source="x_snc_ghc">b9d683a9136db6009718b9b76144b01d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="GitHub Companion">b9d683a9136db6009718b9b76144b01d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ui_script_4a0d4f29676132009ff4dbd457415ae7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jnerius</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-04-12 05:03:20</sys_updated_on><ui_type/><use_scoped_format>false</use_scoped_format></sys_ui_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_2476d32d676132009ff4dbd457415a73
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>GET</http_method><name>Get All Repo Configs</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
	
	var gr = new GlideRecord('x_snc_ghc_repo_config'); 
	gr.query(); 
	
	var repos  = [], // array of repo configs
		config = {}; // single config object for loop
	
	while (gr.next()) {
		config = {}; 
		config.sys_id   = gr.getUniqueValue(); 
		config.name     = gr.getValue('name'); 
		config.url      = gr.getValue('source_repo_url'); 
		config.forked_url = gr.getValue('user_repo_url'); 
		config.forked   = gr.getValue('forked') == '1'; 
		config.imported = gr.getValue('imported') == '1'; 
		config.tags     = getTags(gr.getValue('source_control_repo')); 
		config.app      = gr.getValue('application'); 
		config.repo     = gr.getValue('source_control_repo'); 
		
		repos.push(config); 
	}
	
	return repos; 

})(request, response);

function getTags(repo) {
	var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_repo_tag'); 
	gr.addQuery('sys_repo_config', repo); 
	gr.query(); 
	
	var tags = [], 
		t    = {}; 
	
	while (gr.next()) {
		t = {}; 
		t.name      = gr.getValue('name'); 
		t.object_id = gr.getValue('object_id'); 
		tags.push(t); 
	}
	
	return tags; 
}]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_snc_ghc/gh/repo_config</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/repo_config</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>true</requires_snc_internal_role><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jnerius</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-03-17 03:05:31</sys_created_on><sys_id>2476d32d676132009ff4dbd457415a73</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Get All Repo Configs</sys_name><sys_package display_value="GitHub Companion" source="x_snc_ghc">b9d683a9136db6009718b9b76144b01d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="GitHub Companion">b9d683a9136db6009718b9b76144b01d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_2476d32d676132009ff4dbd457415a73</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-01-10 15:44:01</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="GitHub">9c95132d676132009ff4dbd457415a2b</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sysevent_script_action_8933a3c6677d72009ff4dbd457415a5c
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sysevent_script_action"><sysevent_script_action action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><condition_script/><description/><event_name>plugin.upgraded</event_name><name>Re-Link Repo Config to App</name><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[// After a branch switch, the Application field on the Repo Config
// record gets cleared out. This script looks it up and re-sets the value. 
var grSysApp = new GlideRecord('sys_app'); 
grSysApp.addQuery('scope', event.parm1); 
grSysApp.query(); 
if (grSysApp.next()) {
	var grSysRepo = new GlideRecord('sys_repo_config'); 
	grSysRepo.addQuery('sys_app', grSysApp.getUniqueValue()); 
	grSysRepo.query(); 
	if (grSysRepo.next()) {
		// Find the GHC Repo Config Record
		var grRepoConfig = new GlideRecord('x_snc_ghc_repo_config'); 
		grRepoConfig.addQuery('source_control_repo', grSysRepo.getUniqueValue()); 
		grRepoConfig.query(); 
		if (grRepoConfig.next()) {
			grRepoConfig.application = grSysRepo.getValue('sys_app'); 
			grRepoConfig.update(); 
		}
	}
}]]></script><synchronous>false</synchronous><sys_class_name>sysevent_script_action</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jnerius</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-03-31 03:33:32</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>8933a3c6677d72009ff4dbd457415a5c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Re-Link Repo Config to App</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="GitHub Companion" source="x_snc_ghc">b9d683a9136db6009718b9b76144b01d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="GitHub Companion">b9d683a9136db6009718b9b76144b01d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysevent_script_action_8933a3c6677d72009ff4dbd457415a5c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jnerius</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-03-31 03:45:24</sys_updated_on></sysevent_script_action></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_1ef6572d676132009ff4dbd457415a2e
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>GET</http_method><name>OAuth Token Exists</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
    var entityProfileId = gs.getProperty('x_snc_ghc.oauth_entity_profile_id'); 
	var c = new sn_auth.GlideOAuthClient();
	var t = c.getToken(gs.getUserID(), entityProfileId);
	
	return {
		token_exists: !gs.nil(t.getAccessToken())
	}; 

})(request, response);
]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_snc_ghc/gh/token_exists</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/token_exists</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>true</requires_snc_internal_role><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jnerius</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-03-17 03:07:08</sys_created_on><sys_id>1ef6572d676132009ff4dbd457415a2e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>OAuth Token Exists</sys_name><sys_package display_value="GitHub Companion" source="x_snc_ghc">b9d683a9136db6009718b9b76144b01d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="GitHub Companion">b9d683a9136db6009718b9b76144b01d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_1ef6572d676132009ff4dbd457415a2e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-01-10 15:44:01</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="GitHub">9c95132d676132009ff4dbd457415a2b</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_62d6172d676132009ff4dbd457415a71
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>POST</http_method><name>Import App</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
	// Get Repo Config
	var grRepoConfig = new GlideRecord('x_snc_ghc_repo_config'); 
	if (!grRepoConfig.get(request.pathParams.repo_config)) {
		return { error: true }; 
	}
	
	// Get Token
	var entityProfileId = gs.getProperty('x_snc_ghc.oauth_entity_profile_id');
	var c = new sn_auth.GlideOAuthClient();
	var t = c.getToken(gs.getUserID(), entityProfileId);
	var token = t.getAccessToken(); 
	
	// Build request body
	var req = {}; 
	req.url = grRepoConfig.source_repo_url; 
	req.setTestConnection = false; 
	req.username = new GitHubClient().getUser().login; 
	req.password = token; 
	
	// Construct REST Call
	var endpoint = 'https://' + gs.getProperty('instance_name') + '.service-now.com'; 
    var rm = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2(); 
	rm.setLogLevel('all');
	rm.setHttpMethod('POST');
	rm.setEndpoint(endpoint + '/api/sn_devstudio/v1/vcs/apps'); 
	rm.setQueryParameter('sysparm_transaction_scope', 'global'); 
	rm.setRequestHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json'); 
	rm.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', gs.getSession().getSessionToken()); 
	rm.setRequestBody(JSON.stringify(req)); 
	var r = rm.execute(); 
	var responseBody = r.getBody(); 
	return JSON.parse(responseBody); 
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_snc_ghc/gh/import_app/{repo_config}</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/import_app/{repo_config}</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>true</requires_snc_internal_role><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jnerius</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-03-17 03:06:45</sys_created_on><sys_id>62d6172d676132009ff4dbd457415a71</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Import App</sys_name><sys_package display_value="GitHub Companion" source="x_snc_ghc">b9d683a9136db6009718b9b76144b01d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="GitHub Companion">b9d683a9136db6009718b9b76144b01d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_62d6172d676132009ff4dbd457415a71</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-01-10 15:44:01</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="GitHub">9c95132d676132009ff4dbd457415a2b</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_snc_ghc.fromXML</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>fromXML</name><script><![CDATA[/**
 * The fromXML() method parses an XML string, constructing the JavaScript
 * value or object described by the string.
 *
 * @function fromXML
 * @param text {String} The string to parse as XML
 * @param [reviver] {Function} If a function, prescribes how the value
 * originally produced by parsing is transformed, before being returned.
 * @returns {Object}
 */

var fromXML;

(function(exports) {
  var UNESCAPE = {
    "&": "&",
    "<": "<",
    ">": ">",
    "'": "'",
    """: '"'
  };

  var ATTRIBUTE_KEY = "@";
  var CHILD_NODE_KEY = "#";

  exports.fromXML = fromXML = _fromXML;

  function _fromXML(text, reviver) {
    return toObject(parseXML(text), reviver);
  }

  function parseXML(text) {
    var list = String.prototype.split.call(text, /<([^!<>?](?:'[\S\s]*?'|"[\S\s]*?"|[^'"<>])*|!(?:--[\S\s]*?--|\[[^\[\]'"<>]+\[[\S\s]*?]]|DOCTYPE[^\[<>]*?\[[\S\s]*?]|(?:ENTITY[^"<>]*?"[\S\s]*?")?[\S\s]*?)|\?[\S\s]*?\?)>/);
    var length = list.length;

    // root element
    var root = {f: []};
    var elem = root;

    // dom tree stack
    var stack = [];

    for (var i = 0; i < length;) {
      // text node
      var str = list[i++];
      if (str) appendText(str);

      // child node
      var tag = list[i++];
      if (tag) parseNode(tag);
    }

    return root;

    function parseNode(tag) {
      var tagLength = tag.length;
      var firstChar = tag[0];
      if (firstChar === "/") {
        // close tag
        var closed = tag.replace(/^\/|[\s\/].*$/g, "").toLowerCase();
        while (stack.length) {
          var tagName = elem.n && elem.n.toLowerCase();
          elem = stack.pop();
          if (tagName === closed) break;
        }
      } else if (firstChar === "?") {
        // XML declaration
        appendChild({n: "?", r: tag.substr(1, tagLength - 2)});
      } else if (firstChar === "!") {
        if (tag.substr(1, 7) === "[CDATA[" && tag.substr(-2) === "]]") {
          // CDATA section
          appendText(tag.substr(8, tagLength - 10));
        } else {
          // comment
          appendChild({n: "!", r: tag.substr(1)});
        }
      } else {
        var child = openTag(tag);
        appendChild(child);
        if (tag[tagLength - 1] === "/") {
          child.c = 1; // emptyTag
        } else {
          stack.push(elem); // openTag
          elem = child;
        }
      }
    }

    function appendChild(child) {
      elem.f.push(child);
    }

    function appendText(str) {
      str = removeSpaces(str);
      if (str) appendChild(unescapeXML(str));
    }
  }

  function openTag(tag) {
    var elem = {f: []};
    tag = tag.replace(/\s*\/?$/, "");
    var pos = tag.search(/[\s='"\/]/);
    if (pos < 0) {
      elem.n = tag;
    } else {
      elem.n = tag.substr(0, pos);
      elem.t = tag.substr(pos);
    }
    return elem;
  }

  function parseAttribute(elem, reviver) {
    if (!elem.t) return;
    var list = elem.t.split(/([^\s='"]+(?:\s*=\s*(?:'[\S\s]*?'|"[\S\s]*?"|[^\s'"]*))?)/);
    var length = list.length;
    var attributes, val;

    for (var i = 0; i < length; i++) {
      var str = removeSpaces(list[i]);
      if (!str) continue;

      if (!attributes) {
        attributes = {};
      }

      var pos = str.indexOf("=");
      if (pos < 0) {
        // bare attribute
        str = ATTRIBUTE_KEY + str;
        val = null;
      } else {
        // attribute key/value pair
        val = str.substr(pos + 1).replace(/^\s+/, "");
        str = ATTRIBUTE_KEY + str.substr(0, pos).replace(/\s+$/, "");

        // quote: foo="FOO" bar='BAR'
        var firstChar = val[0];
        var lastChar = val[val.length - 1];
        if (firstChar === lastChar && (firstChar === "'" || firstChar === '"')) {
          val = val.substr(1, val.length - 2);
        }

        val = unescapeXML(val);
      }
      if (reviver) {
        val = reviver(str, val);
      }
      addObject(attributes, str, val);
    }

    return attributes;
  }

  function removeSpaces(str) {
    return str && str.replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g, "");
  }

  function unescapeXML(str) {
    return str.replace(/(&(?:lt|gt|amp|apos|quot|#(?:\d{1,6}|x[0-9a-fA-F]{1,5}));)/g, function(str) {
      if (str[1] === "#") {
        var code = (str[2] === "x") ? parseInt(str.substr(3), 16) : parseInt(str.substr(2), 10);
        if (code > -1) return String.fromCharCode(code);
      }
      return UNESCAPE[str] || str;
    });
  }

  function toObject(elem, reviver) {
    if ("string" === typeof elem) return elem;

    var raw = elem.r;
    if (raw) return raw;

    var attributes = parseAttribute(elem, reviver);
    var object;
    var childList = elem.f;
    var childLength = childList.length;

    if (attributes || childLength > 1) {
      // merge attributes and child nodes
      object = attributes || {};
      childList.forEach(function(child) {
        if ("string" === typeof child) {
          addObject(object, CHILD_NODE_KEY, child);
        } else {
          addObject(object, child.n, toObject(child, reviver));
        }
      });
    } else if (childLength) {
      // the node has single child node but no attribute
      var child = childList[0];
      object = toObject(child, reviver);
      if (child.n) {
        var wrap = {};
        wrap[child.n] = object;
        object = wrap;
      }
    } else {
      // the node has no attribute nor child node
      object = elem.c ? null : "";
    }

    if (reviver) {
      object = reviver(elem.n || "", object);
    }

    return object;
  }

  function addObject(object, key, val) {
    if ("undefined" === typeof val) return;
    var prev = object[key];
    if (prev instanceof Array) {
      prev.push(val);
    } else if (key in object) {
      object[key] = [prev, val];
    } else {
      object[key] = val;
    }
  }
})(typeof exports === "object" && exports || {});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jnerius</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-10-17 21:11:46</sys_created_on><sys_id>fc7399badb35030005b1dec0cf961907</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>fromXML</sys_name><sys_package display_value="GitHub Companion" source="x_snc_ghc">b9d683a9136db6009718b9b76144b01d</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="GitHub Companion">b9d683a9136db6009718b9b76144b01d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_fc7399badb35030005b1dec0cf961907</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jnerius</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-10-17 21:11:46</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ui_script_d8fc0f29676132009ff4dbd457415a33
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ui_script"><sys_ui_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description/><global>false</global><name>x_snc_ghc.ghc_app</name><script><![CDATA[angular.module('ghCompanion', [])
	.controller('GitHubCompanionCtrl', function($scope, $http, $window, $interval) {   
	
	// Set default header X-UserToken
	$http.defaults.headers.common['X-UserToken'] = $window.g_ck; 
	
	// Possibly the most important part of this app
	$scope.octocats = [
		'original.png',
		'octobiwan.jpg',
		'class-act.png',
		'forktocat.jpg',
		'repo.png',
		'setuptocat.jpg', 
		'socialite.jpg',
		'inspectocat.jpg',
		'riddlocat.png'
	]; 

	$scope.randomOcto = $scope.octocats[Math.floor(Math.random() * $scope.octocats.length)]; 

	$scope.tokenChecked = false; 
	$scope.hasToken     = false; 
	$scope.token        = ''; 
	$scope.user         = {}; 
	$scope.repoConfigs  = []; 
	$scope.transaction  = null; 
	$scope.progressId   = ''; 
	$scope.message      = ''; 
	$scope.processing   = false; 

	// This is a spaghetti mess and should be consolidated into services
	
	$scope.$watch('progressId', function() {
		if ($scope.progressId != '') {
			// $scope.message = 'Progress ID changed to ' + $scope.progressId; 
			$scope.progressChecker = $interval($scope.getStatus, 300); 
		}
	});  
	
	$scope.getStatus = function() {
		$http.get('/api/sn_devstudio/v1/vcs/transactions/' + $scope.progressId).then(
			function success(response) {
				$scope.transaction = response.data.result; 
				if ($scope.transaction.state > "1") {
					$interval.cancel($scope.progressChecker); 
					$scope.processing = false; 
					$scope.syncRepoConfigs();
				}
			},
			function failure(response) {
				
			}
		);
	}; 
	
	$scope.checkForToken = function() {
		$http.get('/api/x_snc_ghc/gh/token_exists').then(
			function success(response) {
				$scope.hasToken = response.data.result.token_exists; 
				$scope.loadUserInfo(); 
				$scope.loadRepoConfigs(); 
				$scope.loadToken(); 
			},
			function failure(response) {
				
			}
		);
	}; 
	
	$scope.loadUserInfo = function() {
		$http.get('/api/x_snc_ghc/gh/gh_user').then(
			function success(response) {
				// console.log(response); 
				$scope.user = response.data.result; 
			},
			function failure(response) {
				
			}
		); 
	}; 
	
	$scope.loadToken = function() {
		$http.get('/api/x_snc_ghc/gh/get_token').then(
			function success(response) {
				// console.log(response); 
				$scope.token = response.data.result.token; 
			},
			function failure(response) {
				
			}
		); 
	}; 
	
	$scope.loadRepoConfigs = function() {
		$http.get('/api/x_snc_ghc/gh/repo_config').then(
			function success(response) {
				$scope.repoConfigs = response.data.result;
				console.log($scope.repoConfigs); 
			},
			function failure(response) {
				
			}
		); 
	}; 
	
	$scope.forkAndLink = function(repoConfig, index) {
		$scope.clickedIndex = index; 
		// console.log(repoConfig); 
		$http.post('/api/x_snc_ghc/gh/fork_repo/' + repoConfig.sys_id).then(
			function success(response) {
				
				$http.post('/api/sn_devstudio/v1/vcs/apps', {
					url: response.data.result.clone_url, 
					username: $scope.user.login, 
					password: $scope.token, 
					setTestConnection: false
				}, {
					params: { sysparm_transaction_scope: 'global' }
				}).then(
					function success(response) {
						// console.log(response); 
						$scope.progressId = response.data.result.progressId; 
					}, 
					function failure(response) {
						
					}
				); 
			},
			function failure(response) {
				
			}
		); 
	}; 

	$scope.syncRepoConfigs = function() {
		$http.post('/api/x_snc_ghc/gh/repo_config_sync').then(
			function success(response) {
				console.log(response.data); 
				$scope.loadRepoConfigs(); 
			},
			function failure(response) {
				
			}
		); 
	}; 
	
	$scope.initiateOAuth = function() {
		var oauthRequestorContext = 'sys_user'; 
		var oauthRequestorSysId   = g_user.userID; 
		var oauthProfileId        = '84c4aa2a1345b6009718b9b76144b0cc'; 

		var oauth_initiator_url = '/oauth_initiator.do' +
				'?oauth_requestor_context=' + oauthRequestorContext +
				'&oauth_requestor='         + oauthRequestorSysId +
				'&oauth_provider_profile='  + oauthProfileId +
				'&response_type=code';

		$window.open(oauth_initiator_url, '', 'height=500,width=800');
	}; 
	
	$scope.initiateLoginWindow = function() {
		var localLoginUrl = '/x_snc_ghc_login.do'; 
		var loginWindow = $window.open(localLoginUrl, '', 'height=460,width=400'); 
		loginWindow.onunload = function() {
			$window.location.reload(); 
		}; 
	}; 
	
	// Spaghetti ahead
	$scope.tagClicked = function(tag, config, index) {
		$scope.clickedIndex = index;

		var proceed = confirm('Switch to ' + tag.name + '?'); 
		
		if (proceed) {
			$scope.processing = true; 
			console.log(JSON.stringify(tag, null, 4) + '\n\n' + 
				  JSON.stringify(config, null, 4)); 

			var branchName = 'checkpoint-' + tag.name; 
			var endpoint = '/api/sn_devstudio/v1/vcs/apps/' + config.app + '/repos/' + config.repo + '/branches'
			$http.get(endpoint, {
				params: { sysparm_transaction_scope: config.app }
			}).then(
				function success(response) {
					console.log(response)
					var branches = response.data.result.branches; 
					var branch; 
					var existing = false; 

					for (var i=0; i<branches.length; i++) {
						branch = branches[i]; 
						if (branch.name == branchName) {
							existing = true; 
							console.log('Branch ' + branchName + ' already exists. Switching to it now...'); 
							$scope.switchToBranch(branchName, config); 
							break; 
						}
					}
					
					if (!existing) {
						console.log('Branch ' + branchName + ' does not exist. Creating it now...'); 
						$scope.createBranchFromTag(tag, config); 
					}
				}, 
				function failure(response) {

				}
			);
		}
	}; 

	$scope.createBranchFromTag = function(tag, config) {
		var newBranchName = "checkpoint-" + tag.name; 
		var endpoint = '/api/sn_devstudio/v1/vcs/apps/' + config.app + '/repos/' + config.repo + '/branches'; 
		$http.post(endpoint, {
			branchName: newBranchName, 
			preserveLocalChanges: true, 
			tagName: tag.name
		}, {
			params: { sysparm_transaction_scope: config.app }
		}).then(
			function success(response) {
				// console.log(response); 
				$scope.progressId = response.data.result.progressId; 
			}, 
			function failure(response) {
				
			}
		); 
	}; 

	$scope.switchToBranch = function(branchName, config) {
		var endpoint = '/api/sn_devstudio/v1/vcs/apps/' + config.app + '/repos/' + config.repo + '/branches/' + branchName; 
		$http.put(endpoint, {
			appId: config.appId, 
			branchName: branchName, 
			preserveLocalChanges: true
		}, {
			params: { sysparm_transaction_scope: config.app }
		}).then(
			function success(response) {
				$scope.progressId = response.data.result.progressId; 
			}, 
			function failure(response) {
				
			}
		); 
	}; 
	
	$scope.checkForToken(); 
});
/*


$http.post('/api/sn_devstudio/v1/vcs/apps', {
					url: response.data.result.clone_url, 
					username: $scope.user.login, 
					password: $scope.token, 
					setTestConnection: false
				}, {
					params: { sysparm_transaction_scope: 'global' }
				}).then(
					function success(response) {
						// console.log(response); 
						$scope.progressId = response.data.result.progressId; 
					}, 
					function failure(response) {
						
					}
*/]]></script><script_name>ghc_app</script_name><sys_class_name>sys_ui_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jnerius</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-03-17 02:23:21</sys_created_on><sys_id>d8fc0f29676132009ff4dbd457415a33</sys_id><sys_mod_count>35</sys_mod_count><sys_name>x_snc_ghc.ghc_app</sys_name><sys_package display_value="GitHub Companion" source="x_snc_ghc">b9d683a9136db6009718b9b76144b01d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="GitHub Companion">b9d683a9136db6009718b9b76144b01d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ui_script_d8fc0f29676132009ff4dbd457415a33</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jnerius</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-04-12 03:01:56</sys_updated_on><ui_type/><use_scoped_format>false</use_scoped_format></sys_ui_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_55b5132d676132009ff4dbd457415aff
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>POST</http_method><name>Create Personal Access Token</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
	var resp = {}; 
	var oauthPeer               = gs.getProperty('x_snc_ghc.oauth_app_registry_id'); 
	var oauthEntityProfileId    = gs.getProperty('x_snc_ghc.oauth_entity_profile_id'); 
	var oauthRequestorProfileId = _getOrCreateRequestorProfile(oauthEntityProfileId, gs.getUserID()).getValue('sys_id'); 
	
	var username = request.body.data.username; 
	var password = request.body.data.password; 
	var code     = request.body.data.code || ''; 
	
    var g = new GitHubClient(); 
	var t = g.createPersonalAccessToken(username, password, code); 

	if (t.httpStatus == 201) {
		_createCredential(oauthRequestorProfileId, oauthPeer, t.data.token, 'GitHub'); 
	}

	return {
		httpStatus: t.httpStatus,
		twoFactor: t.twoFactor
	}
})(request, response);

function _createCredential(requestorId, peer, token, name) {
	var cred = new GlideRecord('oauth_credential'); 
	cred.addQuery('peer', peer); 
	cred.addQuery('token', token); 
	cred.addQuery('user', gs.getUserID()); 
	cred.query(); 
	
	if (!cred.next()) {
		cred.newRecord(); 
		cred.peer   = peer; 
		cred.token  = token; 
		cred.user   = gs.getUserID(); 
		cred.type   = 'access_token'; 
		cred.scopes = 'repo, admin:repo_hook'; 
		cred.oauth_requestor_profile = requestorId; 
		cred.expires = gs.endOfNextYear();
		cred.insert(); 
	}
}

function _getOrCreateRequestorProfile(entityProfileId, userId) {
	var gr = new GlideRecord('oauth_requestor_profile'); 
	gr.addQuery('oauth_entity_profile', entityProfileId); 
	gr.addQuery('requestor_context', 'sys_user'); 
	gr.addQuery('requestor_id', userId); 
	gr.query(); 
	
	if (!gr.next()) {
		gr.newRecord(); 
		gr.oauth_entity_profile = entityProfileId; 
		gr.requestor_context = 'sys_user'; 
		gr.requestor_id = userId; 
		gr.insert(); 
	}
	
	return gr; 
}]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_snc_ghc/gh/gh_token</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/gh_token</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>true</requires_snc_internal_role><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jnerius</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-03-17 03:02:43</sys_created_on><sys_id>55b5132d676132009ff4dbd457415aff</sys_id><sys_mod_count>15</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Create Personal Access Token</sys_name><sys_package display_value="GitHub Companion" source="x_snc_ghc">b9d683a9136db6009718b9b76144b01d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="GitHub Companion">b9d683a9136db6009718b9b76144b01d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_55b5132d676132009ff4dbd457415aff</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-01-10 15:44:01</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="GitHub">9c95132d676132009ff4dbd457415a2b</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_0c27972d676132009ff4dbd457415a0f
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>POST</http_method><name>Sync Repo Configs</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {

   var grConfig = new GlideRecord('x_snc_ghc_repo_config');
   var qc = grConfig.addQuery('source_control_repo', ''); 
   qc.addOrCondition('application', ''); 
   grConfig.query(); 

   var updates = 0; 

   while (grConfig.next()) {
       var scRepo = getSourceControlRepo(grConfig.user_repo_url);
       if (scRepo) {
           updates++; 
           grConfig.source_control_repo = scRepo.getUniqueValue();
           grConfig.application = scRepo.getValue('sys_app'); 
           grConfig.update(); 
       }
   }

   return {
       updates: updates
   }; 

})(request, response);

function getSourceControlRepo(url) {
    var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_repo_config'); 
    gr.addQuery('url', url); 
    gr.query(); 

    if (gr.next()) {
        return gr; 
    } else {
        return ''; 
    }
}]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_snc_ghc/gh/repo_config_sync</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/repo_config_sync</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>true</requires_snc_internal_role><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jnerius</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-03-17 03:07:56</sys_created_on><sys_id>0c27972d676132009ff4dbd457415a0f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Sync Repo Configs</sys_name><sys_package display_value="GitHub Companion" source="x_snc_ghc">b9d683a9136db6009718b9b76144b01d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="GitHub Companion">b9d683a9136db6009718b9b76144b01d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_0c27972d676132009ff4dbd457415a0f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-01-10 15:44:01</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="GitHub">9c95132d676132009ff4dbd457415a2b</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

19:03:26</sys_updated_on><value>(function paginate(variables, pageResponse) {
    // Use this script to set pagination variables or 
    // manipulate variables extracted by XPath or JSON Path
    var limit = parseInt(variables.limit);
    var currentPage = parseInt(variables.page);
    var nextPage = currentPage++;
    if(nextPage < limit){
        variables.page = nextPage.toString();
    } else {
        variables.getNextPage = false;
    }
})(variables, pageResponse);</value><variable display_value="">f68d35c0e713230007a64caac2f6a959</variable></sys_variable_value></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_878d3a05db710300d0d6f7fdbf96190e
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>POST</http_method><name>Pull Request Webhook</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
	var ghc = new GitHubClient();
	// Handle 'ping' request on initial webhook registration
	if (request.getHeader('X-GitHub-Event') == 'ping') {
		return {
			success: true
		};
	}
	
	var sys_id="";
	var json = request.body.data;
	var stringified = JSON.stringify(json);
	gs.debug(stringified);
	var action = json.action;
	var incoming_pull_request = json.pull_request;
	if (action == "opened" || action == 'unassigned') {
		var new_pull_request = new GlideRecord("x_snc_ghc_pull_request");
		new_pull_request.initialize();
		new_pull_request.setValue("title", incoming_pull_request.title);
		new_pull_request.setValue("body", incoming_pull_request.body);
		new_pull_request.setValue("state", action);
		new_pull_request.setValue("number", incoming_pull_request.number);
		new_pull_request.setValue("id", incoming_pull_request.id);
		new_pull_request.setValue("diff_url", incoming_pull_request.diff_url);
		new_pull_request.setValue("sender", incoming_pull_request.user.login);
		new_pull_request.setValue("open_time", incoming_pull_request.created_at);
		new_pull_request.setValue("last_activity", incoming_pull_request.updated_at);
		new_pull_request.setValue("comment", incoming_pull_request.body);
		var repo_id = lookupRepoByURL(json.repository.html_url);
		new_pull_request.setValue("repo_config", repo_id);
		new_pull_request.setValue("diff", ghc.getDiffFile(incoming_pull_request.diff_url));
		if (new_pull_request.insert() ){
			sys_id = new_pull_request.getUniqueValue();
			ghc.createFilesForPullRequest(new_pull_request);
		}
		
		if (sys_id) {			
			return {"status":"created", "sys_id":sys_id, "mesage":"Created new Pull Request: "};
		} else {
			return {"status":"error", "message":"Creation of Pull Request record failed"};
		}		
	} else {
	// This is everything other then a newly opened pull request
		var lookup_repo_id = lookupRepoByURL(json.repository.html_url);

		var gr = new GlideRecord("x_snc_ghc_pull_request");
		gr.addQuery("repo_config", lookup_repo_id);
		gr.addQuery("number", incoming_pull_request.number);

		gr.query();
		if (gr.next()) {
			gr.setValue("state", action);
			gr.setValue("comment", incoming_pull_request.body);
			gr.setValue("repo_config", lookup_repo_id); 
			gr.setValue("last_activity", incoming_pull_request.updated_at);
			gr.update();
		}
		
	}
	
})(request, response);

function lookupRepoByURL(url){
	
	var sys_id = "";
	var gr = new GlideRecord("x_snc_ghc_repo_config");
	gr.addQuery("source_repo_url", url);
	gr.query();
	if (gr.next()) {
	   sys_id = gr.getUniqueValue();
	}
	return sys_id;
}
]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_snc_ghc/gh/pull_request</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/pull_request</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>false</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>false</requires_snc_internal_role><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-10-12 18:50:35</sys_created_on><sys_id>878d3a05db710300d0d6f7fdbf96190e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>13</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Pull Request Webhook</sys_name><sys_package display_value="GitHub Companion" source="x_snc_ghc">b9d683a9136db6009718b9b76144b01d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="GitHub Companion">b9d683a9136db6009718b9b76144b01d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_878d3a05db710300d0d6f7fdbf96190e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-01-10 15:44:02</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="GitHub">9c95132d676132009ff4dbd457415a2b</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_b08d9bad676132009ff4dbd457415aec
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_snc_ghc.GitHubClient</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>GitHubClient</name><script><![CDATA[var GitHubClient = Class.create();
GitHubClient.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
        this.entityProfileId = gs.getProperty('x_snc_ghc.oauth_entity_profile_id');
    },

    getUser: function() {
        try {
            var rm = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('x_snc_ghc.GitHub', 'Get Authenticated User');
            this._applyToken(rm);
            var r = rm.execute();
            var responseBody = r.getBody();
            var httpStatus = r.getStatusCode();

            return JSON.parse(responseBody);
        } catch (ex) {
            return ex.message;
        }
    },

    forkRepo: function(user, repo) {
        try {
            var rm = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('x_snc_ghc.GitHub', 'Fork Repo');
            this._applyToken(rm);
            rm.setStringParameterNoEscape('owner', user);
            rm.setStringParameterNoEscape('repo', repo);

            var r = rm.execute();
            var responseBody = r.getBody();
            var httpStatus = r.getStatusCode();
            return JSON.parse(responseBody);
        } catch (ex) {
            return ex.message;
        }
    },

    createPersonalAccessToken: function(username, password, otp) {
        try {
            var r = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('x_snc_ghc.GitHub', 'Create Personal Token');
            r.setStringParameter('suffix', new GlideDateTime().toString());
            r.setBasicAuth(username, password);

            // If a one-time-password is specified, add it
            if (otp) {
                r.setRequestHeader('X-GitHub-OTP', otp);
            }

            var response = r.execute();
            var responseBody = response.getBody();
            var httpStatus = response.getStatusCode();

            var responseObj = {};
            responseObj.httpStatus = response.getStatusCode();
            responseObj.twoFactor = response.getHeader('X-GitHub-OTP') || '';
            responseObj.data = JSON.parse(responseBody);
            responseObj.body = responseBody;

            return responseObj;
        } catch (ex) {
            var message = ex.getMessage();
        }
    },
    getFilesForPullRequest: function(user, repo, pull_number) {
        var files = [];
        var json = [];
        var final_json = [];
        var last_page = -1;
        var current_page = 0;
        var failsafe = 10;
        var httpStatus = 0;
        do {
            try {
                current_page++;
                var rm = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('x_snc_ghc.GitHub', 'Get Files for Pull Request');
                this._applyToken(rm);
                rm.setStringParameterNoEscape('owner', user);
                rm.setStringParameterNoEscape('repo', repo);
                rm.setStringParameterNoEscape('pull_number', pull_number);
                var pageString = current_page.toString();
                rm.setStringParameterNoEscape('page', pageString);

                var r = rm.execute();
                var responseBody = r.getBody();
                httpStatus = r.getStatusCode();
                if (httpStatus == 200) {
                    json = JSON.parse(responseBody);
                } else {
                    var error = JSON.parse(responseBody).message;
                    gs.addErrorMessage(error);
                }
            } catch (ex) {
                gs.error(ex);
            }
            final_json = final_json.concat(json);
        } while (httpStatus == 200 && json.length > 0 && current_page < failsafe);

        /* JTN: Commenting for later removal. Returning entire payload instead so 
         * we have access to other properties
        if (json) {
        	for (var i=0; i<json.length; i++) {
        		var fileJSON = json[i];
        		var j = {"filename":fileJSON.filename, "blob_url":fileJSON.blob_url };
        		files.push(j);
        	}
        	 
        }
        */

        return final_json || [];
        // return files;
    },

    createFilesForPullRequest: function(current) {
        gs.debug("Running createFilesForPullRequest");
        var owner = current.repo_config.github_user;
        var repo = current.repo_config.github_repo_name;
        var number = current.getValue("number");
        var ghu = new GitHubUtils();
        var files = this.getFilesForPullRequest(owner, repo, number);
        var string = JSON.stringify(files);

        gs.debug("Recieved files: " + string);

        for (var i = 0; i < files.length; i++) {
            var file = files[i].filename;
            var raw = files[i].raw_url;
            var diff = ghu.parseDiff(file, current.diff);
            var regExp = new RegExp('-\\s+<(?!(sys_id|sys_updated_on))\\w*>', 'g');
            gs.debug('diff check ' + diff.match(regExp));
            while (regExp.test(diff)) {
                var gr = new GlideRecord("x_snc_ghc_file");
                gr.initialize();
                gr.setValue("filename", file);
                gr.setValue("url", raw);
                gr.setValue("diff", diff);
                gr.setValue("pull_request", current.getUniqueValue());
                gr.insert();
            }
        }
        var prDiff = new GlideRecord("x_snc_ghc_file");
        prDiff.addQuery('pull_request', current.getUniqueValue());
        prDiff.query();
        current.diff = '';
        while (prDiff.next()) {
            current.diff += prDiff.diff + "\n";
        }
        current.state = 'review_requested';
        current.update();
    },
    registerWebhookForRepo: function(username, repo) {
        var webhookUrl = this._getWebhookUrl();
        var result = false;
        var rm = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('x_snc_ghc.GitHub', 'Subscribe Webhook to Pull Requests');
        this._applyToken(rm);
        rm.setStringParameterNoEscape('owner', username);
        rm.setStringParameterNoEscape('repo', repo);
        rm.setStringParameterNoEscape('url', webhookUrl);
        rm.setStringParameterNoEscape('name', "GitHub Companion Webhook");

        try {
            var r = rm.execute();
            var responseBody = r.getBody();
            var httpStatus = r.getStatusCode();
            if (httpStatus == 201) {
                result = true;
            }
            json = JSON.parse(responseBody);
            gs.debug("json returned from subscribing webhook: " + responseBody);
        } catch (ex) {}
        return result;
    },

    closePR: function(user, repo, number, comment) {
        var result = false;
        var rm = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('x_snc_ghc.GitHub', 'Close PR');
        this._applyToken(rm);
        rm.setStringParameterNoEscape('owner', user);
        rm.setStringParameterNoEscape('repo', repo);
        rm.setStringParameterNoEscape('pull_number', number);
        var body = '{"state":"closed"}';
        rm.setRequestBody(body);
        this.commentPR(user, repo, number, comment);
        try {
            var r = rm.execute();
            var responseBody = r.getBody();
            var httpStatus = r.getStatusCode();
            if (httpStatus == 201) {
                result = true;
            }
            json = JSON.parse(responseBody);
            gs.debug("json returned from Closing PR: " + responseBody);
        } catch (ex) {}
        return result;

    },
    commentPR: function(user, repo, number, comment) {
        var result = false;
        var rm = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('x_snc_ghc.GitHub', 'Comment PR');
        this._applyToken(rm);
        rm.setStringParameterNoEscape('owner', user);
        rm.setStringParameterNoEscape('repo', repo);
        rm.setStringParameterNoEscape('pull_number', number);
        var body = '{"body":"'+comment+'"}';
        rm.setRequestBody(body);
        try {
            var r = rm.execute();
            var responseBody = r.getBody();
            var httpStatus = r.getStatusCode();
            if (httpStatus == 201) {
                result = true;
            }
            json = JSON.parse(responseBody);
            gs.debug("json returned from commenting PR: " + responseBody);
        } catch (ex) {}
        return result;

    },
    getDiffFile: function(diff_url) {
        var result = false;
        var diff = "";
        var rm = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
        rm.setHttpMethod('GET');
        rm.setEndpoint(diff_url);
        this._applyToken(rm);

        try {
            var r = rm.execute();
            diff = r.getBody();
            var httpStatus = r.getStatusCode();
            if (httpStatus == 201) {
                result = true;
            }
            gs.debug("diff file returned from lookup to " + diff_url + " : " + responseBody);
        } catch (ex) {}
        return diff;
    },

    acceptChangesForFile: function(fileGR) {
        var updateSetId = new global.GitHubCompanionUpdateSet().getCurrentUpdateSet();
        gs.addInfoMessage('Current Update Set ID: ' + updateSetId);

        var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_update_set');
        gr.addQuery('sys_id', updateSetId);
        gr.query();

        if (gr.next()) {
            var message = 'Current Update Set Name: ' + gr.getDisplayValue();
            message += ', Current Application: ' + gr.application.getDisplayValue();
            gs.addInfoMessage(message);
        } else {
            gs.addErrorMessage('Could not find update set');
        }

        if (gr.getValue('application') != fileGR.pull_request.repo_config.application) {
            gs.addErrorMessage('Current update set does not match the application in this file');
        } else {
            // Do some scary stuff
            var xml = this._getFileContents(fileGR.url);
            new global.GitHubCompanionUpdateManager().loadXML(xml, true, null, 'x_snc_ghc_file', fileGR.sys_id);

            // Some more scary stuff
            var obj = fromXML(xml);
            var table = obj.record_update['@table'];
            var recordId = obj.record_update[table].sys_id;
            this._addToUpdateSet(table, recordId);
            fileGR.setValue("state", 3);
            fileGR.update();
        }

    },

    acceptChangesForPullRequest: function(pullRequestGR, comment) {
        var fileGR = new GlideRecord("x_snc_ghc_file");
        fileGR.addQuery("pull_request", pullRequestGR.sys_id);
        fileGR.query();
        gs.addInfoMessage("Aceepting " + fileGR.getRowCount() + " files for Pull Request #" + pullRequestGR.id + " on " + pullRequestGR.repo_config.github_repo_name);
        gs.addInfoMessage("These changes are accepted locally and still need to be committed to GitHub");
        while (fileGR.next()) {
            //gs.addInfoMessage("Would be doing acceptChangesForFile on " + fileGR.sys_id +":" +fileGR.filename);
            this.acceptChangesForFile(fileGR);
        }
        pullRequestGR.pr_comment = comment;
        pullRequestGR.state = 'closed';
        pullRequestGR.update();

    },

    rejectChangesForPullRequest: function(pullRequestGR, comment) {
        var fileGR = new GlideRecord("x_snc_ghc_file");
        fileGR.addQuery("pull_request", pullRequestGR.sys_id);
        fileGR.query();
        gs.addInfoMessage("Rejecting Pull Request #" + pullRequestGR.id + " on " + pullRequestGR.repo_config.github_repo_name);
        pullRequestGR.pr_comment = comment;
        pullRequestGR.state = 'closed';
        pullRequestGR.update();

    },


    _getRestMessage: function(message, method) {
        var rm = sn_ws.RESTMessageV2(message, method);
        this._applyToken(rm);
        return rm;
    },

    _applyToken: function(rm, userID) {
        var c = new sn_auth.GlideOAuthClient();
        var t;
        if (userID) {
            t = c.getToken(gs.userID, this.entityProfileId);
        } else {
            t = c.getToken(gs.getUserID(), this.entityProfileId);
        }
        var accessToken = t.getAccessToken();
        rm.setRequestHeader('Authorization', 'Bearer ' + accessToken);
    },

    _getWebhookUrl: function() {
        var instanceName = gs.getProperty('instance_name');
        var path = "";
        var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_ws_operation");
        gr.addQuery("name", "Pull Request Webhook");
        gr.query();
        if (gr.next()) {
            path = gr.getValue("operation_uri");
        }
        return "https://" + instanceName + ".service-now.com" + path;
    },

    _addToUpdateSet: function(table, sysId) {
        var gr = new GlideRecord(table);
        gr.get(sysId);

        new global.GitHubCompanionUpdateManager().saveRecord(gr);
    },

    _getFileContents: function(url) {
        var rm = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
        rm.setHttpMethod('GET');
        rm.setEndpoint(url);
        var response = rm.execute();
        var body = response.getBody();
        return body;
    },


    type: 'GitHubClient'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jnerius</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-03-17 03:37:03</sys_created_on><sys_id>b08d9bad676132009ff4dbd457415aec</sys_id><sys_mod_count>62</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GitHubClient</sys_name><sys_package display_value="GitHub Companion" source="x_snc_ghc">b9d683a9136db6009718b9b76144b01d</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="GitHub Companion">b9d683a9136db6009718b9b76144b01d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_b08d9bad676132009ff4dbd457415aec</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-05-30 16:30:50</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>POST</http_method><name>Fork Repo</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
	var gh = new GitHubClient(); 
    var gr = new GlideRecord('x_snc_ghc_repo_config'); 
	if (gr.get(request.pathParams.repo_config)) {
		var repo = gh.forkRepo(gr.github_user, gr.github_repo_name); 
		gr.forked = true; 
		gr.user_repo_url = repo.clone_url;
		gr.update(); 
		return repo; 
	} else {
		return { error: true }; 
	}

})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_snc_ghc/gh/fork_repo/{repo_config}</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/fork_repo/{repo_config}</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>true</requires_snc_internal_role><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jnerius</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-03-17 03:04:08</sys_created_on><sys_id>3336932d676132009ff4dbd457415a53</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Fork Repo</sys_name><sys_package display_value="GitHub Companion" source="x_snc_ghc">b9d683a9136db6009718b9b76144b01d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="GitHub Companion">b9d683a9136db6009718b9b76144b01d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_3336932d676132009ff4dbd457415a53</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-01-10 15:44:01</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="GitHub">9c95132d676132009ff4dbd457415a2b</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_02b6d32d676132009ff4dbd457415a6c
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>GET</http_method><name>Get OAuth Token</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
	var entityProfileId = gs.getProperty('x_snc_ghc.oauth_entity_profile_id'); 
    var c = new sn_auth.GlideOAuthClient();
	var t = c.getToken(gs.getUserID(), entityProfileId);
	return { token: t.getAccessToken() }; 

})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_snc_ghc/gh/get_token</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/get_token</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>true</requires_snc_internal_role><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jnerius</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-03-17 03:06:05</sys_created_on><sys_id>02b6d32d676132009ff4dbd457415a6c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Get OAuth Token</sys_name><sys_package display_value="GitHub Companion" source="x_snc_ghc">b9d683a9136db6009718b9b76144b01d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="GitHub Companion">b9d683a9136db6009718b9b76144b01d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_02b6d32d676132009ff4dbd457415a6c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-01-10 15:44:01</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="GitHub">9c95132d676132009ff4dbd457415a2b</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>
